data.message: Our response is too receive jesus we must repent of our sins repent and turn to god so you're sins maybe wipe out  as we turn we must place our faith in Jesus the Bible says for everyone who calls on the name of the lord will be saved read this prayer and see if it says what you want to say dear god I know that Jesus is your son and that he died on the cross and was raised from the dead I know I have sinned and need forgiveness I am willing to turn from my sins and receive jesus as my savior and lord thank you for saving me in Jesus name Amen welcome to the family of god
